description: FOUR MORE GREAT STORIES OF SWORD AND SORCERYBOLD!BRUTAL!BRILLIANT!The carpet shuddered; a ripping motion ran along its fringes. The carpet continued to rise until it towered above the roof of the palace.THE RUG AND THE BULL L.
